::Windlord/Nightlight/Termitron::

Windlord ended to packed some suplied, and he will carried them in 
robot mode"It's time to go... I'll wait you outside..." 

And he left; nightlight was slightly anguised because she didn't know 
what was going on there, she went close to the kids and asked to 
Aerotaur "What's happening? Why we have to go???"

"Anything will happen with you Queen? " replied Termitron while he 
moved near to Nightlight



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Trinity::
> 
> "So, how do we make you a saber tooth tiger then huh?" she asked,
